sentences.en: Any Contracting Party may denounce this Treaty by notification addressed to the Director General.
sentences.cn: 任何缔约方均可退出本条约,退约应通知总干事.

sentences.en: Came to two again pastoral, also denounce water to drink in Home Afandi.
sentences.cn: 又来了两个牧人, 也到阿凡提家里讨水喝.

sentences.en: Denounce us, and then keep the blood money?
sentences.cn: 先公开指责我们然后占有这笔抚恤金 吗 ?

sentences.en: German leaders all took the opportunity to denounce the attacks and plead for tolerance.
sentences.cn: 德国领导人们都藉此机会谴责这些攻击，并且恳请宽容。

sentences.en: He had thought to denounce or even assault this man.
sentences.cn: 他本来想要申斥,甚至痛打这个人一顿.

sentences.en: Henkel of Germany to enter the Chinese market in the near future also defeated denounce.
sentences.cn: 德国汉高在进入中国市场不久后也败下阵来,宣告退出.

sentences.en: I denounce them to Heaven and to earth.
sentences.cn: 我向天堂和人世控告他们.

sentences.en: If I do not denounce myself?
She denounced him to the police.
Still, many people continue to use the 70 s to denounce all things liberal or activist.
sentences.cn: 依然, 那么多人不断地用70年代来抨击所有开明或实干之事.

sentences.en: The counselor bounced up to denounce discount.
sentences.cn: 顾问上升蹦跳指责折扣.

sentences.en: The group denounced the failure by the authorities to take action.
sentences.cn: 该团体谴责当局没有采取行动。

sentences.en: They denounce all attempts at guiding choice.
sentences.cn: 他们痛斥所有试图选择正确写作指导的做法.

sentences.en: They were at the mercy of informers who might at any moment denounce them.
sentences.cn: 他们完全受那些随时可能告发他们的告密者的支配。
我们应该公开指责异端邪说.

sentences.en: You shouldn't denounce others from time to time.
sentences.cn: 你不要总是动不动就指斥别人.

trans.tran_en: to express strong disapproval of someone or something, especially in public

trans.tran_cn: 谴责， 指责； 告发
trans.tran_en: to express strong disapproval of someone or something, especially in public
